title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: The sleep-debt-tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to help users monitor and manage their sleep debt. This repository showcases a practical application of TypeScript in a front-end environment, focusing on providing a user-friendly interface for tracking sleep patterns and identifying potential sleep deficits.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a project built with Next.js 14 (using the Pages Router), TypeScript, and styled with CSS and MUI, serving as a platform for [briefly mention the project's purpose, e.g., task management, note-taking, etc.]. It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and management, demonstrating best practices in modern web development with TypeScript.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project focused on creating interactive map visualizations using a combination of HTML for the front-end and Python for data processing or backend logic. The repository contains code and resources related to this project, showcasing techniques for displaying geographical data and user interactions on a map interface.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a full-stack CRUD application built with Python and Flask, utilizing PostgreSQL for data storage. This project demonstrates a practical implementation of web development principles, covering key topics such as database interactions, API development, and front-end design using HTML and CSS. Shell scripts are also included for simplified deployment and management.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a project built using TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript focused on creating a modern and efficient voting application. It leverages cutting-edge web technologies to provide a seamless and user-friendly experience for managing and participating in various types of polls and elections.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the source code for my resume, built using LaTeX for professional formatting and potentially deployed as a static HTML page for online viewing. It serves as a project to showcase document creation and web deployment skills, focusing on presentation and accessibility of my qualifications.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository provides a web-based interface for monitoring and interacting with robotic systems managed by Robofleet. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, this project offers real-time data visualization and control functionalities, facilitating efficient oversight and management of robot fleets.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-Idea-Board is a project management tool built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help teams brainstorm, organize, and track project ideas from conception to completion. It provides a visual and collaborative space for capturing initial thoughts, refining them into actionable plans, and managing their progress within a simple, intuitive interface. This repository serves as the central source for the application's code and development efforts.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a modern dashboard application built with Next.js, leveraging the power of TypeScript for type safety, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for dynamic functionality. This repository serves as a learning resource and a practical example for developing robust and visually appealing dashboard interfaces using cutting-edge web technologies.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic Event Calendar is a JavaScript, CSS, and HTML project implementing a responsive and interactive event calendar. This repository provides a front-end solution for displaying and managing events in a visually appealing and user-friendly way, making it a useful component for any project requiring event scheduling and presentation.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: iot-asset-tracking is a Next.js project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, leveraging Supabase for backend services and Tailwind CSS for styling, to provide a comprehensive solution for tracking IoT assets. This repository showcases a modern web application architecture, focusing on efficient data management and a user-friendly interface for monitoring the location and status of connected devices.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, this project aims to provide a user-friendly interface for debugging and understanding ROS system behavior. It enables users to easily filter, search, and explore log data, facilitating efficient troubleshooting and performance analysis within the ROS ecosystem.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a project built using TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, and Vitejs, leveraging Express.js to interface with the Gemini API. It's designed to be a learning experience and demonstration of integrating modern web technologies with a powerful AI service, exploring topics related to project setup, API integration, and front-end development with TypeScript.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, contains personal finance projects aimed at learning and applying data analysis techniques to real-world financial scenarios. It explores various project topics within finance, offering practical examples and code implementations for personal learning and experimentation with financial data using Python.

title: fruit-seller
description: fruit-seller is a Next.js 14 e-commerce project built with TypeScript and JavaScript, utilizing MUI for the user interface. This repository demonstrates a full-stack web application implementing features for selling fruit, leveraging React Query for efficient data fetching, and organized with Next.js's pages router. It serves as a practical example covering various topics including e-commerce development, UI design, and modern web application architecture.
